goal.en: “This course deals with today’s human resource management for students to acquire a strong ground in all key HR functions. In today’s business environment, human capital has become one of the most important assets for any organizations. So how to compete for talent and build and deploy talent resources is one of the challenges for organization to help gaining its competitive advantage. After completing this course, you should: - Be able to identify each of the major HRM functions. - Be able to recognize the major trends, opportunities, and challenges in today’s HRM. - Be better able to diagnose strategic organizational situation and adopt HR techniques to address the issues. - Be able to equip with the fundamental competencies in HR practices as an employee in business.“

content.en:
“Introduction
Ch. 1 Introduction to HRM
Equal opportunity and the law
Ch. 3 Human resource management strategy and performance
Ch. 4 Job analysis and talent management process
Ch. 5 Personnel planning ＆ recruiting
Ch. 6 Employee testing and selection
Ch. 7 Interviewing candidates
Invited speech
Midterm examination
Ch. 8 Training and developing employees
Ch. 9 Performance management and appraisal
Ch. 10 Managing careers and retention
Ch. 17 Managing global HRM
Ch. 11 Establishing strategic pay plans
Ch. 12 Pay for performance and benefits
Final exam“

“課程簡介

第四章 工作分析與人才管理流程

第七章 面談
演講
期中考

第十章 職涯管理與留才
第十七章 全球HRM
第十一章 建立策略薪酬計畫
第十二章 績效酬賞與福利
